channel.title: Error
channel.description:
hello. i was adding items and wanted to check the item if it worked. but i can no longer log into server? when i click on "run" it says
[code=c]Server Running At Port: 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:277) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:167) at server.main(server.java:140) [/code] i dont know how to fix this? can you help me? :(

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You used spaces instead of TABS in a .cfg file. Always use tabs when editing a configuration file. Try again with tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Stiflex Stiflex
item.description:
@Stiflex wrote:

ooh! thank you verry much!

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Stiflex, post:1, topic:298747”]hello. i was adding items and wanted to check the item if it worked. but i can no longer log into server?
when i click on “run” it says

Server Running At Port: 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:277) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:167) at server.main(server.java:140)
i dont know how to fix this? can you help me? :([/quote]

Remove the item. It can’t load that specific item, or something.

Read full topic
